snippet.title: Guitar Hero 64 - Video Showcase
snippet.description:
Made for the SimpleFlips Music themed SM64 hacking competition!

DOWNLOAD: https://romhacking.com/hack/guitar-hero-64

SOUNDTRACK: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DM6c8Zs0sM4

CHANGELOG:

v1.3:
• The chart highways are now significantly less disorienting to look at

• Some other minor bugfixes

v1.2:
• Charts now load at 60FPS!

• Some leniencies added to make hitting HOPOs easier

v1.1:
• Charts are no longer loaded on boot, which opens up the door for new songs to be added!

• Note processing system has been completely rewritten to be more efficient and easier to work with for potential future additions

• Added HOPO support (Hammer-Ons and Pull-Offs)

• Added one new chart (Snowboarding from The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess)

• Whammying has been functionally improved

• Further improvements to overall game stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience

v1.0.3:
• Fix bug introduced in v1.0.2 that causes most game sound to function incorrectly after pausing the game

v1.0.2:
• Properly address visual issues related to power meter

• Further improvements to overall game stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience

v1.0.1:
• Fix memory leak with some charts that could cause a potential crash / immediate fail at the end of the song
    • Easiest to replicate when playing Team Galactic HQ on Easy with a lower hyperspeed setting

• Fix percussive panning in Shifting Sands 2

v1.0:
• Initial Release
